rukus.text: 25|61|Kata barakatamaya tini yini nabhomandale srsti karechena bisala tarakapunja ebam tate sthapana karechena pradipa [1] o alo bikiranakari camda.
25|62|Ara tini'i karechena rata o dinake parasparera anugamirupe tara jan'ya--- ye upadesa grahana karate ba krtajna hate caya.
25|63|Ara ‘rahamana’ -era banda tara'i, yara yamine atyanta binamrabhabe calaphera kare [1] ebam yakhana jahela byaktira taderake (asalina bhasaya) sambodhana kare, takhana tara bale, ‘salama’ [2]
25|64|ebam tara rata atibahita kare tadera rabera uddesye sijadabanata haye o damriye theke [1]
25|65|ebam tara bale, he amadera raba! Apani amadera theke jahannamera sasti hatiye dina, tara sasti to abicchinna.
25|66|Niscaya seta basabasa o abasthanasthala hisebe khuba nikrsta.
25|67|Ebam yakhana tara byaya kare takhana apabyaya kare na, krpanata'o kare na, ara tadera pantha haya etadubhayera madhyabarti [1].

25|68|Ebam tara allah‌ra sathe kono ilahake dake na [1]. Ara allah‌ yara hatya nisedha karechena, yathartha karana chara take hatya kare na [2]. Ara tara byabhicara kare na [3]; ye egulo kare, se sasti bhoga karabe.
25|69|Kiyamatera dina tara sasti bardhitabhabe pradana kara habe ebam sekhane se sthayi habe hina abasthaya
25|70|tabe ye ta'oba kare, imana ane o satkaja kare, phale allah‌ tadera gunahasamuha neka dbara paribartana kare debena. Ara allah‌ ksamasila, parama dayalu.
25|71|Ara ye ta'oba kare o satkaja kare, se to sampurnarupe allah‌ra abhimukhi haya.
25|72|Ara yara mithyara saksya haya na ebam asara karyakalapera sam'mukhina hale apana maryada raksarthe ta parihara kare cale [1].
25|73|Ebam yara tadera rabera ayatasamuha smarana kariye dile tara upara andha ebam badhirera mata pare thake na [1].

25|74|Ebam yara prarthana kare bale, ‘he amadera raba! Amadera jan'ya emana stri o santana-santati dana karuna yara habe amadera jan'ya cokhajurano. Ara apani amaderake karuna muttakidera jan'ya anusaranayogya.
25|75|Tara'i, yaderake pratidana hisebe deya habe jannatera su'ucca kaksa [1] yehetu tara chila dhairyasila. Ara tara prapta habe sekhane abhibadana o salama.
25|76|Sekhane tara sthayi habe. Abasthanasthala o basasthana hisebe ta kata utkrsta
25|77|baluna, ‘amara raba tomadera mote'i bhraksepa karena na, yadi na tomara take daka [1]. Atahpara tomara mithyaropa karecha, sutaram acire'i apariharya habe sasti.’
